sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Waybar is a highly customizable Wayland bar for Sway and Wlroots based compositors. Its configuration is done in JSONC with styling in CSS.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
Install the waybar package.

For the icons of the preconfigured modules a font like otf-font-awesome is needed. Some standard modules need further programs to function properly. Those are visible through error messages from those modules.
